title: *Newly Renovated 3-Bedroom & 1.5-Bathroom Apartment* 95 #3
posting_body: ["*I Can Show You ALL the Available Units in This Building And ALL of Rentopia's Properties ||", 'NO BROKER FEE*', 'We have a great relationship with this landlord and we are the best point of contact for this building', '*Newly Renovated 3-Bedroom & 1.5-Bathroom Apartment*', 'The pictures are showing the actual available unit', '*The Apartment Features:*', '3 Queen-Size Bedroom / Over-Sized Windows / Great Natural Light All Throughout the Apartment / Bathroom with a Deep Soaking Tub / Another Half Bathroom / The Living Space Can Accommodate a Sofa + TV Set-up & a small Dining Table / Skylight Window / Central Heat / Open Concept Kitchen with Full-Size Stainless Steel Appliances including a Built-in Microwave / High Ceilings / Hardwood Floors / Secured Entrance /', "*There's a laundromat a few doors down", 'A Step Away from the J Train at Halsey St Station / A Short walk to the Z Train at Chauncey St Station & the L Train at Wilson Ave Station /', '*Good credit history 700+ and a combined annual income of $144,000+ (=40x times the monthly rent) are required / Personal guarantors are welcome! /', '"Insuret" is accepted on a case by case basis*']
